Uses of Interface
org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.AsynchronousActivity

  • Packages that use AsynchronousActivity 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.activities.dataflow  
    org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant
    Contains the activity classes required in the execution of Beanshell scripts.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity
    Provides definitions for a single Activity to be contained within a Processor.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers
    Contains implementations of DispatchLayer defined by the core Taverna 2 specification.

    • Uses of AsynchronousActivity in org.apache.taverna.activities.dataflow

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataflowActivity
      An Activity providing nested Dataflow functionality.

    • Uses of AsynchronousActivity in org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant

      Classes in org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant that implement AsynchronousActivity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StringConstantActivity
      An Activity that holds a constant string value.

    • Uses of AsynchronousActivity in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity

      Subinterfaces of AsynchronousActivity in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MonitorableAsynchronousActivity<ConfigType>
      An extension of AsynchronousActivity with the additional stipulation that implementing classes must return a set of monitorable properties for the activity invocation instance when invoked.
      Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity that implement AsynchronousActivity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAsynchronousActivity<ConfigType>
      Abstract superclass for asynchronous activities.
      class  DisabledActivity
      A disabled activity is a wrapper for an Activity that is offline or similarly disabled.
      class  NonExecutableActivity<T>
      A non-executable activity is a wrapper for an Activity that cannot be executed, for example because it is offline or unrecognized.
      class  UnrecognizedActivity
      An unrecognized activity is an activity that was not recognized when the workflow was opened.

    • Uses of AsynchronousActivity in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers
